title: Major track fault causing delays on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Pls expect slightly longer train travel time between #YewTee and #JurongEast on the NSL this evening.
[NSL]: Due to a track point fault near #JurongEast, only one stn platform is operational for NSL train svc to #JurongEast this evening.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train svc from #Yewtee to #JurongEast is running normally now.
[NSL]UPDATE: Due to a track fault, pls add 10mins train travel time from #YewTee to #JurongEast. (Not linked to new signalling project).
[NSL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time from #YewTee to #JurongEast. (Not linked to new signalling project).
